policies.title: Terms of Service
policies.intro: These Terms govern your use of the BioMaint platform.

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.text: By accessing or using BioMaint, you agree to comply with these terms. For how we handle personal data, see [privacy]. For our technical safeguards, see [security].

sections.heading: Use of Service
sections.text: You may use BioMaint only for lawful purposes. Accounts must be kept secure and not shared outside your organization without authorization.

sections.heading: Data Ownership
sections.text: You retain ownership of all data you input into BioMaint. We only process this data to provide the service.

sections.heading: Limitations of Liability
sections.text: BioMaint is provided as a SaaS platform with commercially reasonable uptime and support. We are not liable for indirect damages or losses beyond the fees paid.

policies.title: Privacy & Cookie Policy
policies.intro: Explains what we collect, why, and your choices.

sections.heading: Data Collection
sections.text: We collect account details such as name, email, and usage logs to provide and improve BioMaint. Sensitive equipment or hospital records are processed only as part of your usage.

sections.heading: Cookies
sections.text: BioMaint uses cookies for authentication and session management. We do not use third-party tracking cookies for advertising.

sections.heading: Data Sharing
sections.text: We never sell your data. Data may be shared with trusted service providers (e.g., hosting, email delivery) under strict agreements.

sections.heading: Retention & Rights
sections.text: Your data is retained for the duration of your subscription. You may request export or deletion of personal data as required by law. See also our [terms] and [security].

policies.title: Security Policy
policies.intro: How we protect your data and keep the service reliable.

sections.heading: Encryption
sections.text: All data transmitted between your device and the BioMaint API is secured with 256-bit SSL/TLS encryption.

sections.heading: Authentication & Access
sections.text: We use JWT-based authentication with strong password requirements and optional multi-factor authentication. CAPTCHA is triggered on failed login attempts.

sections.heading: Infrastructure
sections.text: BioMaint runs on professionally managed cloud servers with firewalls, intrusion detection, and regular OS patching.

sections.heading: Backups & Recovery
sections.text: Daily encrypted backups are stored across multiple servers. We target 99.9% uptime with procedures to restore service in case of failures.

sections.heading: Incident Response
sections.text: If a security incident occurs, we investigate immediately, apply fixes, and notify impacted customers without delay. Related: [privacy] and [terms].
